name: ANIME STANDING
description:
Year 2153. Humanity survived nuclear catastrophe. It left us scattered all over, hiding in rare safety bunkers far and few in between...

You are playing as our Delivery Agent. Your goal is to deliver packages between the bunkers, keep the packages save & sound, thus taking care of what's left of our inner communications system.

It's one of a kind mission. Dangerous and lonely.

FEATURES

  • Advanced physic of character
  • Huge world to explore
  • Great soundtrack & atmosphere
